description: TEHRAN - The United Nations Security Council held an emergency meeting on Israel’s air attack on the consular section of the Iranian embassy in Damascus, Syria, on Tuesday afternoon at the request of Russia.
title: UN Security Council holds emergency meeting on Israeli strike on Iranian embassy in Syria

description: TEHRAN – Following the Israeli air attack on the consular section of Tehran’s embassy in Syria on Monday afternoon, Iranian Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian telephoned UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres on Tuesday to remind him about the responsibility of the UN as the most important international body as well as the Security Council in “protecting international peace and security”.
title: Iran reminds Guterres on UN responsibility amid Israeli strike on Tehran embassy in Syria

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s Foreign Ministry spokesman has strongly condemned the atrocious assault by the Zionist military on the workers of World Central Kitchen.
title: Iran condemns Israel attack on humanitarian workers, urges global action

description: TEHRAN-Several Iranian artists and galleries will take part in the 10th World Art Dubai (WAD), set to be held in the UAE in May.
title: Tens of Iranian artists, galleries to attend 10th World Art Dubai in May

description: TEHRAN-The Iranian short film “Mrs. Iran's Husband” directed by Marjan Khosravi won two awards at the 38th Fribourg International Film Festival last week.
title: Iranian short flick grasps two prizes at Fribourg International Film Festival

description: TEHRAN – Iranian authorities announced on Tuesday the arrest of two individuals believed to be members of ISIS-Khorasan, a terrorist group, who were planning a terrorist operation in the city of Qom.
title: Iran foils ISIS-Khorasan terror plot in Qom, arrests 2 terrorists

description: TEHRAN - In a note, Kayhan discussed the attack of the Zionist regime on the consulate of the Islamic Republic of Iran in Damascus and the martyrdom of some IRGC military advisers in Syria.
title: The embassies of the Zionist regime should not be safe!

description: TEHRAN – In response to the Israeli airstrike on the Iranian embassy in Damascus, people have gathered in Tehran’s Palestine Square in a massive display of anger and condemnation.
title: Protesters gather in Tehran following Israeli attack on Iranian embassy

description: TEHRAN – U.S. Deputy Special Envoy for Iran Abram Paley paid a surprise visit to the Republic of Azerbaijan, holding meeting with several officials ahead of an anticipated restoration of Tehran-Baku diplomatic relations.
title: U.S. Iran envoy visits Azerbaijan amid Tehran-Baku thaw

description: TEHRAN - International condemnation surged following the attack on the Iranian consulate in Syria on Monday, as nations worldwide voiced outrage over the Israeli airstrike.
title: World condemns Israeli strike on Iranian embassy in Damascus

description: TEHRAN – The UN Security Council will convene an open session on Tuesday following Russia's request regarding Monday's Israeli airstrike on Iran's diplomatic facility in Syria.
title: UNSC to convene after Israeli airstrikes on Iranian diplomatic facilities in Syria

description: TEHRAN - The Israeli regime shocked the world on Tuesday when it struck Iran’s embassy in the Syrian capital, killing over 13 people including a high-ranking IRGC leader and his deputy.
title: Eye for eye

description: TEHRAN - Brigadier General Mohammad Reza Zahedi was a respected military leader who stood shoulder-to-shoulder with distinguished commanders during his lifetime. His dedication and tireless service to his country commenced at the young age of 20, with the outbreak of the Iran-Iraq war.
title: Who was General Zahedi?

description: UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres condemned Tuesday a strike on an Iranian consular annex building in Syria one day earlier, his spokesman said.
title: UN chief condemns strike on Iran consulate in Syria

description: TEHRAN- Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi says Israel has resorted to indiscriminate assassinations after back-to-back failures in the face of the resistance, warning that the regime’s latest crime against Iranian military advisers in Syria “will not go unanswered.”
title: Israel’s heinous crime will not go unanswered: Raisi

description: TEHRAN-Iranian young filmmaker Hamidreza Arjomandi won an award at the 25th Through Women's Eyes International Film Festival, which was held in Florida, the U.S., in mid-March.
title: Iranian young filmmaker wins award at American festival

description: Spain will recognize Palestinian statehood by July, Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez told journalists during a West Asia tour, according to several reports published on Tuesday in Spanish media.
title: PM Sanchez: Spain to recognize Palestinian statehood by July

description: According to HaMoked, an Israeli rights group, the Israel Prisoner Service released its latest data on incarcerated Palestinians, which shows that 40 percent of those detained are being held in “administrative detention” without trial.
title: Israel says it is detaining 9,312 Palestinians

description: Over 8,000 anti-Muslim complaints were recorded across the United States last year, marking the highest total in the 30 years the Council on American-Islamic Relations (CAIR) has tracked the complaints, The Hill reported.
title: CAIR: US anti-Muslim incidents hit record high in 2023

description: Al Jazeera Media Network has responded to Israel’s threat to shut down its operations, calling allegations against it “a dangerous ludicrous lie”.
title: Israel accused of spreading lies

description: Egyptian President Abdel Fattah al-Sisi was sworn in for his third term on Tuesday in the country's new capital, the largest of the mega-projects that have come to symbolize his rule while stretching the country's finances.
title: Egypt's Sisi starts third term

description: Russian President Vladimir Putin vowed retribution for those who sponsored the attack on Crocus City Hall.
title: Putin vows to punish sponsors of Crocus City Hall attack

description: TEHRAN- The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Islamic Republic of Iran condemns in the strongest terms the illegitimate Israeli regime’s missile attack on the consular section building of the Embassy of the Islamic Republic of Iran in Damascus on the evening of Monday, April 1, 2024.
title: Iran condemns Israeli attack on embassy, vows to make regime regret crime

description: Dr Fozia Alvi was making her rounds of the intensive care unit on her final day at the battered European public hospital in southern Gaza when she stopped next to two young arrivals with facial injuries and breathing tubes in their windpipes.
title: Doctors say children have been targeted by Israeli snipers in Gaza

description: TEHRAN- An Israeli airstrike has killed at least half a dozen foreign nationals attempting to deliver life-saving aid to northern Gaza where large parts of the population are facing famine.
title: Israeli military bombs foreign aid convoy

description: TEHRAN - Concerns over an all-out war between Israel and Hezbollah have once again been pushed to the forefront as the regime intensifies attacks and rhetoric against Lebanon.
title: Israel playing with fire

description: TEHRAN- “Death, Central Problems of Philosophy” by English philosopher Geoffrey Scarre has recently been published in Persian.
title: “Death” comes to Iranian bookstores

description: TEHRAN- Young cinema and television actor Reza Davoudnejad passed away in a Shiraz hospital on Monday at the age of 44, due to complications from a blood infection following a liver transplant and after a period of hospitalization.
title: Actor Reza Davoudnejad dies at 44

description: TEHRAN-Gaza is a land that has experienced the relentless oppression of the Israeli regime for generations. The small strip of land in the occupied Palestinian territories is home to numerous tragic and terrifying memories, making it the focus of many documentaries over the years.
title: "Tears of Gaza”: the unseen reality of Israel's oppression

description: TEHRAN  – Bam Khatoon won the 2023/24 the Kowsar Women Football League on Tuesday.
title: Bam Khatoon win Kowsar Women Football League for 10th time

description: TEHRAN – More than five million sea travels have been recorded for the Nowruz holidays, which officially started on March 20.
title: Over 5 million sea trips made for Nowruz holidays

description: TEHRAN - A significant historical artifact, the Sassanid coin featuring Empress Boran (Purandokht), daughter of King Khosrow II, is now on display at the Money Museum in Tehran.
title: Sassanid coin depicting Empress Boran on view at Tehran museum

description: TEHRAN – Various historical sites and museums across Iran witnessed more than 6m visitors in the course of the Persian New Year’s holidays, according to the statistics revealed by the Ministry of Cultural Heritage, Tourism and Handicrafts.
title: 6m museum tickets sold during Nowruz holidays

description: TEHRAN - During the Nowruz holidays, which officially commenced on March 20th, some 65,000 visitors flocked to war memorials and Sacred Defense museums across Ilam province in western Iran.
title: 65,000 Nowruz travelers visit war memorials in Ilam province

description: TEHRAN - In the heart of the ancient city of Semnan, where the whispers of the Silk Road still echo through time, lies a jewel of Islamic architecture, a testament to centuries of cultural exchange and spiritual devotion.
title: Tranquility amidst history: Jameh Mosque welcomes travelers to Semnan

description: TEHRAN - Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei says brave Iranian men will "punish" Israel and make the evil regime "regret" its crime of assassinating the country's military advisors in Syria.
title: Iran will make evil Israel ‘regret’ crime in Syria: Leader

description: TEHRAN - Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei says brave Iranian men will "punish" Israel and make the evil regime "regret" its crime of assassinating the country's military advisors in Syria.
title: Iran will make evil Israel ‘regret’ embassy attack in Syria: Leader

description: TEHRAN – Brazilian goalkeeper Luan Polli Gomes is on the verge of joining Iranian top-flight football club Nassaji.
title: Brazilian keeper Polli reaches agreement with Nassaji

description: TEHRAN – The Iranian Red Crescent Society (IRCS) has sent 1,388 volunteer medical teams comprising 14,668 people to deprived areas in the past Iranian calendar year that ended on March 19.
title: Over 1,380 volunteer medical teams dispatched to deprived areas

description: TEHRAN – Within the framework of a program that started on March 15, the health ministry is conducting syndromic screening; coronavirus, malaria, and cholera tests; as well as rubella and polio vaccinations, an official with the health ministry has said.
title: Health ministry conducting various tests, vaccinations

description: TEHRAN – The Iranian anti-narcotics police (ANP) canteen center has received a total of ten trained detecting drugs from the United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC).
title: UNODC provides Iranian anti-narcotics police with drug-detecting dogs

description: TEHRAN – Fostering a more inclusive society can cultivate environments where people with autism feel more valued and thrive to develop their full potential.
title: Inclusive societies help autistic people flourish

description: TEHRAN- TEDPIX, the main index of the Tehran Stock Exchange (TSE), dropped 15,727 points to 2,245,445 on Tuesday, which is the fourth day of the Iranian calendar week.
title: TEDPIX falls 15,000 points on Tuesday

description: TEHRAN - The value of Iran’s foreign trade including oil and technical engineering services reached $153.17.8 billion in the last Iranian calendar year 1402 (ended on March 19), the head of the Islamic Republic of Iran Customs Administration (IRICA) said.
title: Annual foreign trade exceeds $153m

description: TEHRAN- Production of steel in Iran increased by 5.8 percent in the previous Iranian calendar year 1402 (ended on March 19), as compared to the preceding year, according to the Iranian Steel Producers Association (ISPA).
title: Steel production rises 5.8% year on year

description: TEHRAN - The trade exchanges between Iran and Turkey in the first two months of 2024 reached $930 million, showing a one percent increase compared to the same month last year.
title: Iran-Turkey trade reaches $930m in 2 months

description: HAINAN, China - During a one-week trip to China’s Hainan province, journalists from Asian and Eurasian countries witnessed the prominent development process in the province.
title: Foreign journalists witness outstanding development in China’s Hainan

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s women’s ice hockey player Asal Heydari is very happy to win the 2024 IIHF Women's Asia and Oceania Cup.
title: Iran’s Heydari on cloud nine after winning 2024 IIHF Women's Asia and Oceania Cup
Iran will decide how to ‘punish’ Israel for consulate attack

description: TEHRAN- Seyyed Ammar Hakim, the leader of Iraq's National Wisdom Movement, strongly denounced the Israeli regime's assault on the Iranian consulate in Damascus, resulting in the deaths of multiple staff members and advisors.
title: Hakim Condemns Israel's Attack on Iranian Consulate in Damascus
